eu.kartoffelquadrat.xoxinternals.controller

Class Ranking

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.kartoffelquadrat.xoxinternals.controller.Ranking

  • public class Ranking
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents player scores. Can be created at any point during the gameplay or at the end of the game for final stats.
    Author:
    Maximilian Schiedermeier

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ranking(PlayerReadOnly[] playersDescending, int[] scoresDescending, boolean gameOver)
      Constructor for Ranking beans.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ranking

        public Ranking(PlayerReadOnly[] playersDescending,
               int[] scoresDescending,
               boolean gameOver)
        Constructor for Ranking beans.
        Parameters:
        playersDescending - player object array listing player details. The order should be adapted to the players scored, listing the player with the highest score first, the second highest score second, and so on.
        scoresDescending - the actual scores obtained by the corresponding players of the playersDescending array.
        gameOver - flag to indicate whether no more moves are possible in this session.

    • Method Detail

      • getPlayersDescending

        public PlayerReadOnly[] getPlayersDescending()
        Getter to obtain the player details, ordered by descending score.
        Returns:
        the player details as an array.

      • getScoresDescending

        public int[] getScoresDescending()
        Getter to obtain the player scores, ordered by descending value.
        Returns:
        the player scores as an array.

      • getScoreForPlayer

        public int getScoreForPlayer(java.lang.String playerName)
                      throws ModelAccessException
        Helper method to get the score obtained by a player specified by name.
        Parameters:
        playerName - as the name of the player whose score must be retrieved.
        Returns:
        the score of the specified player.
        Throws:
        ModelAccessException - it the provided player string does not any registered player.

      • isGameOver

        public boolean isGameOver()
        Getter to determine if no more moves are possible by any player.
        Returns:
        boolean flag indicating if no more moves are possible.
